titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the fourth week in April as "Every Kid Healthy Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/20/2013--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Every Kid Healthy Week. Recognizes the importance of promoting healthy lifestyles for children.
